lines.text: I don't think you have to leave anything behind. Just have a beautiful time like all the other junk litter in the universe, then say goodbye. I don't know what else to tell you. Perpetuation and all the crap that goes with it is a big hoax anyway.
Are you sure that was one of them?
What happens when we run out?
We just put another one in. We won't need another for quite aways.
I didn't mean that. I meant what if we run out of all of them or we can't even find any?
They'll figure out another way for us.
But what if that's too hard or expensive and what if they decide they can't change? We'll use each other then, won't we?
Ronald, I have something to tell you.
